title: A dialoge or communycacyon to be had at a table betwene two chyldren, gathered out of the holy scriptures, by Iohan Bale, for his .ij. yonge sonnes Iohan and Paule
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.
publisher: To be sold in ffletestrete at the signe of the Croune, nexte vnto the whyte Fryres gate. Imprynted at London, [by S. Mierdman] for Richarde ffoster.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
